SELECT h.id, h.district_name, h.hospital_name, GROUP_CONCAT(p.package_name ORDER BY hp.order_num ) AS packageName, h.region_id, h.create_on, h.create_by FROM hospital_info h LEFT JOIN hospital_package_info hp ON hp.hospital_info_id=h.id and hp.delete_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN package_info p ON p.id = hp.info_package_id and p.delete_flag = 0 WHERE h.delete_flag = 0
and h.district_name = #{dto.districtName}
and h.hospital_name like '%${dto.hospitalName}%'
GROUP BY h.id
SELECT id, district_name, hospital_name, create_by, create_on FROM hospital_info WHERE id = #{id}
